column17:
Barnes & Wills presents the all-in-one Mixer Grinder that will cater to all your needs in the kitchen. It comes with three jars which are crafted from stainless steel materials and has LID jar covers. With hard chrome blades and 3 speed control it has an excellent performance and the maximum juice output. It runs on a motor RPM of 15000-17000 with a continuous 30 minutes motor rating. The vacuum feet provides greater stability.
